# Apply modernization 2.0 styleguide (2025-12-08 09:28-0500)

_**User (2025-12-08 01:50-0500)**_

There were some inconsitencies with alignment, sizing, and color usage in the design system UI. We updated the primitive overview, colors, and typograpghy pages to adhere to the new styles. Use this prompt to create a styleguide.md file that can be referenced in the agent.md file. Then update the remaining pages with the same changes. Heres the prompt:



Here is a detailed prompt you can use to update the other pages. It encapsulates all the style rules, component usage, and design philosophy we just established.



***

**Prompt:**

> I need to update this page to match the new "Modernization 2.0" style of our Design System documentation. Please refactor the UI using the following strict guidelines:

>

> ### 1. Color System & Theming

> *   **Eliminate Random Colors:** Do not use arbitrary colors (orange, green, blue) for decoration.

> *   **Primary Theme (Action/Data):** Use `var(--color-brand)` (Teal) for interactive elements, links, and **key data values** (like numbers in stats cards).

> *   **Secondary Theme (Structure):** Use `var(--color-secondary)` (Deep Purple) for architectural elements, section headers, and page-level icons.

> *   **Neutral Foundation:** Use `var(--color-muted)` for labels and secondary text.

> *   **Backgrounds:** Replace hardcoded hex tints (e.g., `#3b82f610`) with semantic `rgba` values or standard tokens if available.

>

> ### 2. Typography

> *   **Scale:** Ensure all headings use the **Major Second (`--ms`)** scale (e.g., `var(--font-size-h2--ms)`) to prevent jarring size jumps.

> *   **Body:** Use `var(--line-height-relaxed)` for descriptive paragraphs (`max-width: 65ch`).

>

> ### 3. Components & Patterns

> *   **TokenCopyButton:** Replace any static text display of CSS variables (e.g., `var(--my-token)`) with the `<TokenCopyButton />` component.

>     *   *Import:* `import { TokenCopyButton } from '@/components/tokens/TokenCopyButton';`

>     *   *Usage:* `<TokenCopyButton value="var(--token-name)" displayValue="--token-name" variant="primary" />`

> *   **Page Header:** Follow the standard pattern:

>     1.  **Breadcrumbs** (Links: Muted -> Current: Foreground).

>     2.  **Icon Box:** 56x56px, Rounded-XL, using `var(--color-secondary)` for the icon and a 10% opacity tint for the background.

>     3.  **Title:** H2 weight 700.

>     4.  **Description:** Body size, Muted color.

> *   **Stats/Cards:** Uniform design:

>     *   **Value:** `var(--color-brand)`, Bold, H4 size.

>     *   **Label:** `var(--color-muted)`, Caption size, Uppercase tracking.

>     *   **Container:** `var(--color-card)` background, `var(--radius-xl)` border radius, standard border.

>

> ### 4. Layout

> *   Ensure strictly 4px/8px grid usage (`var(--spacing-4)`, `var(--spacing-8)`).

> *   Align all content to `max-width: var(--layout-

6xl)`.

>

> Please apply these changes to the current file.

---

format:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n{CollectionName.modes.ModeName.Group.Subgroup.Variable}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\nExample chain:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\nGreenshift.Light.Preset.Color.brand\n  â†’ {Semantic.modes.Light.Color.Brand.Default}\n    â†’ {Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\n      â†’ #34d399\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### API Response Format\n&#96;&#96;&#96;typescript\ninterface TokenResponse {\n  collection: string;\n  mode?: string;\n  tokens: Token[];\n  metadata: {\n    count: number;\n    types: string[];\n    lastUpdated: string;\n  };\n}\n\ninterface Token {\n  path: string;           // \"Color.Emerald.400\"\n  name: string;           // \"Emerald 400\"\n  value: string | number; // \"#34d399\" or 24\n  type: string;           // \"color\" | \"number\"\n  cssVariable: string;    // \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\"\n  reference?: string;     // \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\"\n  wpVariable?: string;    // \"--wp--preset--color--brand\"\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### CSS Variable Naming Convention\n- Primitives: &#96;--primitives-{group}-{name}-{shade}&#96;\n- Semantic: &#96;--semantic-{category}-{role}&#96;\n- Components: &#96;--component-{component}-{property}&#96;\n- Greenshift: &#96;--wp--{preset|custom|style}--{path}&#96;\n\n---\n\n## ğŸ“ Session Notes\n\n###   "contents": "'use client';\n\nimport { useState } from 'react';\nimport { Copy, Check } from 'lucide-react';\n\ninterface TokenCopyButtonProps {\n  value: string;\n  displayValue?: string;\n  variant?: 'default' | 'primary' | 'muted' | 'ghost';\n  className?: string;\n}\n\nexport function TokenCopyButton({\n  value,\n  displayValue,\n  variant = 'default',\n  className = '',\n}: TokenCopyButtonProps) {\n  const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleCopy = async (e: React.MouseEvent) =&gt; {\n    e.stopPropagation();\n    try {\n      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);\n      setCopied(true);\n      setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);\n    } catch (err) {\n      console.error('Failed to copy:', err);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const colors = {\n    default: { \n      bg: 'var(--color-background)', \n      border: 'var(--color-border)', \n      text: 'var(--color-foreground)', \n      hoverBg: 'var(--color-card-border)' \n    },\n    primary: { \n      bg: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.1)', \n      border: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.2)', \n      text: 'var(--color-brand)', \n      hoverBg: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.15)' \n    },\n    muted: { \n      bg: 'var(--color-background)', \n      border: 'transparent', \n      text: 'var(--color-muted)', \n      hoverBg: 'var(--color-card-border)' \n    },\n    ghost: {\n      bg: 'transparent',\n      border: 'transparent',\n      text: 'currentColor',\n      hoverBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.05)'\n    }\n  };\n\n  const style = colors[variant];\n  const label = displayValue || value;\n\n  return (\n    &lt;button\n      onClick={handleCopy}\n      className={&#96;group relative inline-flex items-center gap-2 font-mono transition-all duration-200 ${className}&#96;}\n      style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n        color: copied ? 'var(--color-success)' : style.text,\n        backgroundColor: copied ? 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1)' : style.bg,\n        border: &#96;1px solid ${copied ? 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.2)' : style.border}&#96;,\n        padding: '4px 8px',\n        borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n        cursor: 'pointer',\n        maxWidth: '100%',\n      }}\n      title={&#96;Copy ${value}&#96;}\n      onMouseEnter={(e) =&gt; {\n        if (!copied) {\n          e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.hoverBg;\n          if (variant === 'primary') {\n            e.currentTarget.style.borderColor = 'var(--color-brand)';\n          } else if (variant !== 'ghost') {\n            e.currentTarget.style.borderColor = 'var(--color-muted)';\n          }\n        }\n      }}\n      onMouseLeave={(e) =&gt; {\n        if (!copied) {\n          e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bg;\n          e.currentTarget.style.borderColor = style.border;\n        }\n      }}\n    &gt;\n      &lt;span style={{ \n        overflow: 'hidden', \n        textOverflow: 'ellipsis', \n        whiteSpace: 'nowrap',\n        marginRight: '14px' // Reserve space for icon\n      }}&gt;\n        {label}\n      &lt;/span&gt;\n      \n      &lt;div\n        style={{\n          position: 'absolute',\n          right: '8px',\n          display: 'flex',\n          alignItems: 'center',\n          justifyContent: 'center',\n        }}\n      &gt;\n        {copied ? (\n          &lt;Check size={12} className=\"text-emerald-500 animate-in zoom-in duration-200\" /&gt;\n        ) : (\n          &lt;Copy \n            size={12} \n            style={{ opacity: 0.4 }} \n            className=\"group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity\"\n          /&gt;\n        )}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/button&gt;\n  );\n}\n",
  "totalLinesInFile": 125
}

## Summary

### 1. Created `styleguide.md`
A comprehensive styleguide documenting the "Modernization 2.0" visual language including:
- **Color System**: Brand (Teal) for interactive/data, Secondary (Deep Purple) for structure
- **Typography**: Major Second scale for documentation pages
- **Component Patterns**: Page headers, stats cards, info boxes, token reference chains
- **Layout**: 4px/8px grid system
- **TokenCopyButton**: Standard usage patterns

### 2. Updated Pages with Consistent Styles

**`/tokens/spacing/page.tsx`**
- Updated icon box to use secondary theme
- Stats now use brand color consistently
- Replaced inline CopyButton with TokenCopyButton

**`/tokens/semantic/page.tsx`**
- Updated icon box to secondary theme
- Stats use brand color for all values
- Token reference chains use consistent colors (secondary for primitive, brand for semantic)
- Architecture note uses secondary theme

**`/tokens/colors/page.tsx`**
- Token chain visualization uses proper theme colors
- Stats use brand color consistently
- Primitives link card uses secondary theme

**`/tokens/components/page.tsx`**
- Reference chain example uses secondary theme
- Type badges use brand/secondary colors
- Architecture note uses secondary theme

**`/frameworks/greenshift/page.tsx`**
- Stats use brand color for all values
- Integration info and usage notes use secondary theme
- WP variable displays use brand color

**`/page.tsx` (home)**
- Typography card uses secondary color variable

### 3. Updated `agent.md`
- Added reference to `styleguide.md` in Design Decisions section
- Added Session 8 notes documenting the Modernization 2.0 updates
- Added styleguide to Quick Links section

_**User (2025-12-08 01:50-0500)**_

The style and use of icons next to titles is still inconsistent. Some use borders, some dont, some have colored background with colored icon, others use colored icon with neutral background. I would prefer the main page title have a larger colored icon with neutral bg and matching colored border. Smaller icons next to titles further down the page should be the colored icon only with no border or background. Update all pages and the design styleguide to reflect this.

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-opus-high-thinking, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user wants me to update the icon styling to be consistent across all pages. The rules are:

1. **Main page title icons**: Larger colored icon with neutral background and matching colored border
2. **Smaller section icons**: Colored icon only, no border or background

Let me first update the styleguide to document this, then update all pages.

Looking at the screenshots:
- Typography page: Has a box with background and no visible border, icon is colored
- Color System page: The main stat has no icon, but sections have icons with backgrounds
- Greenshift page: Has a larger icon box with background

The new standard should be:
- **Page header icon box (56x56px)**: 
  - Background: neutral (like `var(--color-card)` or `rgba(0,0,0,0.03)`)
  - Border: 1px solid matching the icon color (brand or secondary)
  - Icon: colored (brand or secondary)
  
- **Section header icons (40-48px)**:
  - No background
  - No border
  - Just the colored icon

Let me update the styleguide first, then all the pages.</details></think>

---

I'll update the styleguide first, then update all pages to follow the new consistent icon patterns.

  "contents": "# Altitude Design System UI - Styleguide\n\n&gt; **Version:** Modernization 2.0  \n&gt; **Last Updated:** December 8, 2025\n\nThis document defines the visual language and component patterns used throughout the Design System documentation app. All pages should adhere to these guidelines for consistency.\n\n---\n\n## 1. Color System &amp; Theming\n\n### 1.1 Eliminate Random Colors\nâŒ **DON'T:** Use arbitrary colors (orange, green, blue, purple) for decoration or to differentiate sections.\n\nâœ… **DO:** Use the semantic color system consistently across all pages.\n\n### 1.2 Primary Theme (Action/Data) - Brand Color\n**Token:** &#96;var(--color-brand)&#96; (Teal - &#96;#2AAFB8&#96;)\n\nUse for:\n- Interactive elements (links, buttons, hover states)\n- **Key data values** (numbers in stats cards)\n- Active states and selections\n- Token variable names in copy buttons (via &#96;TokenCopyButton variant=\"primary\"&#96;)\n- Visual bars/indicators for spacing, progress\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Stats card value */\n.stat-value {\n  color: var(--color-brand);\n  font-weight: 700;\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 1.3 Secondary Theme (Structure) - Deep Purple\n**Token:** &#96;var(--color-secondary)&#96; (Deep Purple - &#96;#444B8C&#96;)\n\nUse for:\n- Section headers and page-level icons\n- Architectural elements (layer indicators, structural diagrams)\n- The icon in page header icon boxes\n- Category section headers\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Page header icon */\n.header-icon-box {\n  background-color: rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.1);\n  border: 1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.2);\n  color: var(--color-secondary);\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 1.4 Neutral Foundation\n**Token:** &#96;var(--color-muted)&#96; (Gray - &#96;#6b7280&#96;)\n\nUse for:\n- Labels and secondary text\n- Descriptions and helper text\n- Breadcrumb links (non-current)\n- Table headers (uppercase, small)\n\n### 1.5 Background Patterns\nâŒ **DON'T:** Use hardcoded hex tints like &#96;#3b82f610&#96;, &#96;#10b98115&#96;\n\nâœ… **DO:** Use semantic rgba values or CSS custom properties:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Good - Brand-based tint */\nbackground-color: rgba(var(--color-brand-rgb), 0.1);\nborder: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-brand-rgb), 0.2);\n\n/* Good - Secondary-based tint */\nbackground-color: rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.05);\nborder: 1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.15);\n\n/* Acceptable - For token reference chain chips */\nbackground-color: rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.08);  /* Brand layer */\nbackground-color: rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.08);   /* Primitive layer */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 2. Typography\n\n### 2.1 Scale Selection\nAlways use the **Major Second (&#96;--ms&#96;)** scale for documentation pages to prevent jarring size jumps:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Headings */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h2--ms);   /* Page title */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h4--ms);   /* Section title */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h5--ms);   /* Subsection */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h6--ms);   /* Card title */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 2.2 Body Text\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Paragraph descriptions */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-body);\nline-height: var(--line-height-relaxed);\nmax-width: 65ch;\ncolor: var(--color-muted);\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 2.3 Labels &amp; Captions\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Uppercase labels */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-caption);\ntext-transform: uppercase;\nletter-spacing: 0.05em;\ncolor: var(--color-muted);\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 3. Components &amp; Patterns\n\n### 3.1 TokenCopyButton Component\n\n**Always** use &#96;&lt;TokenCopyButton /&gt;&#96; instead of displaying static CSS variable text.\n\n**Import:**\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\nimport { TokenCopyButton } from '@/components/tokens/TokenCopyButton';\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n**Variants:**\n- &#96;primary&#96; - Brand-colored background, for main token displays\n- &#96;muted&#96; - Subtle background, for inline references\n- &#96;default&#96; - Standard neutral style\n- &#96;ghost&#96; - Transparent, for minimal interference\n\n**Usage:**\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n// For token variable displays\n&lt;TokenCopyButton \n  value=\"var(--color-brand)\" \n  displayValue=\"--color-brand\" \n  variant=\"primary\" \n/&gt;\n\n// For inline references\n&lt;TokenCopyButton value=\"--spacing-4\" variant=\"muted\" /&gt;\n\n// With full var() syntax\n&lt;TokenCopyButton value={&#96;var(${token.cssVariable})&#96;} /&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.2 Page Header Pattern\n\nEvery documentation page should follow this header structure:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n&lt;div style={{ marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-8)' }}&gt;\n  {/* 1. Breadcrumbs */}\n  &lt;div style={{ \n    display: 'flex', \n    alignItems: 'center', \n    gap: 'var(--spacing-2)', \n    marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-4)' \n  }}&gt;\n    &lt;Link href=\"/tokens\" style={{ \n      fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', \n      color: 'var(--color-muted)', \n      textDecoration: 'none' \n    }}&gt;\n      Tokens\n    &lt;/Link&gt;\n    &lt;ChevronRight size={14} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n    &lt;span style={{ \n      fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', \n      color: 'var(--color-foreground)', \n      fontWeight: 500 \n    }}&gt;\n      Current Page\n    &lt;/span&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n\n  {/* 2. Icon + Title Block */}\n  &lt;div style={{ \n    display: 'flex', \n    alignItems: 'flex-start', \n    gap: 'var(--spacing-4)' \n  }}&gt;\n    {/* Icon Box - 56x56px, Rounded-XL, Secondary color */}\n    &lt;div style={{\n      width: 56,\n      height: 56,\n      borderRadius: 'var(--radius-xl)',\n      backgroundColor: 'rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.1)',\n      border: '1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.2)',\n      display: 'flex',\n      alignItems: 'center',\n      justifyContent: 'center',\n      flexShrink: 0,\n      color: 'var(--color-secondary)',\n    }}&gt;\n      &lt;IconComponent size={28} /&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n\n    &lt;div&gt;\n      {/* Title - H2, Bold */}\n      &lt;h1 style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-h2)',\n        fontWeight: 700,\n        color: 'var(--color-foreground)',\n        marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n      }}&gt;\n        Page Title\n      &lt;/h1&gt;\n      \n      {/* Description - Body, Muted, max 65ch */}\n      &lt;p style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body)',\n        color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n        lineHeight: 'var(--line-height-relaxed)',\n        maxWidth: '65ch',\n      }}&gt;\n        Description of the page content...\n      &lt;/p&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.3 Stats Cards\n\nUniform design for quick statistics:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n&lt;div style={{\n  display: 'grid',\n  gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(120px, 1fr))',\n  gap: 'var(--spacing-4)',\n  marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-8)',\n}}&gt;\n  {stats.map((stat) =&gt; (\n    &lt;div key={stat.label} style={{\n      backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n      border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n      borderRadius: 'var(--radius-xl)',\n      padding: 'var(--spacing-4)',\n      textAlign: 'center',\n    }}&gt;\n      {/* Value - Brand color, Bold, H4 size */}\n      &lt;div style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-h4)',\n        fontWeight: 700,\n        color: 'var(--color-brand)',  // Always brand color for values\n        marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n      }}&gt;\n        {stat.value}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n      \n      {/* Label - Caption, Muted, Uppercase */}\n      &lt;div style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n        color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n        textTransform: 'uppercase',\n        letterSpacing: '0.05em',\n      }}&gt;\n        {stat.label}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  ))}\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.4 Content Cards\n\nStandard card container:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n&lt;div style={{\n  backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n  border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n  borderRadius: 'var(--radius-xl)',\n  padding: 'var(--spacing-5)',\n}}&gt;\n  {/* Card content */}\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.5 Info/Architecture Boxes\n\nFor explanatory sections about token architecture:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n{/* Using Secondary color theme */}\n&lt;div style={{\n  backgroundColor: 'rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.05)',\n  border: '1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.15)',\n  borderRadius: 'var(--radius-xl)',\n  padding: 'var(--spacing-5)',\n}}&gt;\n  &lt;h3 style={{\n    fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body)',\n    fontWeight: 600,\n    color: 'var(--color-secondary)',\n    marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n  }}&gt;\n    About [Topic]\n  &lt;/h3&gt;\n  &lt;p style={{\n    fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body-small)',\n    color: 'var(--color-foreground)',\n    lineHeight: 'var(--line-height-relaxed)',\n  }}&gt;\n    Explanation text...\n  &lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.6 Token Reference Chain\n\nVisual representation of token flow (Value â†’ Primitive â†’ Semantic â†’ Component):\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n&lt;div style={{ \n  display: 'flex', \n  alignItems: 'center', \n  gap: 'var(--spacing-2)', \n  flexWrap: 'wrap' \n}}&gt;\n  {/* Raw Value */}\n  &lt;div style={{\n    padding: 'var(--spacing-1) var(--spacing-2)',\n    backgroundColor: 'var(--color-background)',\n    border: '1px solid var(--color-border)',\n    borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n  }}&gt;\n    &lt;span style={{ \n      fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', \n      fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace', \n      color: 'var(--color-foreground)' \n      color: 'var(--color-brand)' \n    }}&gt;\n      Color.Brand\n    &lt;/span&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 4. Layout\n\n### 4.1 Grid System\nStrict 4px/8px grid usage:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Spacing values */\nvar(--spacing-1)   /* 4px */\nvar(--spacing-2)   /* 8px */\nvar(--spacing-3)   /* 12px */\nvar(--spacing-4)   /* 16px */\nvar(--spacing-5)   /* 20px */\nvar(--spacing-6)   /* 24px */\nvar(--spacing-8)   /* 32px */\nvar(--spacing-10)  /* 40px */\nvar(--spacing-12)  /* 48px */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 4.2 Content Width\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\nmax-width: var(--layout-6xl);  /* 1152px - Standard pages */\nmax-width: var(--layout-7xl);  /* 1280px - Wide pages like color palettes */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 4.3 Section Spacing\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Between major sections */\nmargin-bottom: var(--spacing-10);  /* 40px */\n\n/* Between subsections */\nmargin-bottom: var(--spacing-8);   /* 32px */\n\n/* Between related elements */\nmargin-bottom: var(--spacing-4);   /* 16px */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 5. Common Patterns Checklist\n\nWhen updating a page, ensure:\n\n- [ ] **Breadcrumbs** use muted color for links, foreground for current\n- [ ] **Page icon** is 56x56px with secondary color theme\n- [ ] **Title** uses H2 size, weight 700\n- [ ] **Description** has max-width 65ch, line-height relaxed\n- [ ] **Stats cards** use brand color for values, muted for labels\n- [ ] **Token variables** use &#96;&lt;TokenCopyButton /&gt;&#96; component\n- [ ] **No hardcoded hex colors** for decorative elements\n- [ ] **Grid alignment** uses 4px/8px multiples\n- [ ] **Card containers** use &#96;var(--radius-xl)&#96; and standard border\n- [ ] **Architecture notes** use secondary color theme\n\n---\n\n## 6. Layer Color Reference\n\nFor token architecture visualization, use these consistent colors:\n\n| Layer | Color | Usage |\n|-------|-------|-------|\n| Greenshift | &#96;#06b6d4&#96; (Cyan) | Framework adapter layer |\n| Components | Brand theme | Component tokens |\n| Semantic | Brand theme | Role-based tokens |\n| Typography | Secondary theme | Type scale tokens |\n| Primitives | Secondary theme | Raw value tokens |\n\n---\n\n## 7. Icon Selection\n\nUse Lucide React icons. Common icons by page type:\n\n- **Primitives:** &#96;Hash&#96;\n- **Semantic:** &#96;Sparkles&#96;\n- **Components:** &#96;Box&#96;\n- **Typography:** &#96;Type&#96;\n- **Colors:** &#96;Palette&#96;\n- **Spacing:** &#96;Ruler&#96;\n- **Greenshift:** &#96;Globe&#96;\n\n---\n\n*This styleguide should be referenced for all new pages and when updating existing pages in the Design System documentation app.*\n",

I've updated the styleguide and all pages to follow the new consistent icon pattern. Here's a summary:

## Icon Pattern Changes

### Page Header Icons (56Ã—56px)
- **Background:** `var(--color-card)` (neutral)
- **Border:** `1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.3)` (colored, matching icon)
- **Icon Color:** `var(--color-secondary)`

### Section Header Icons
- **No background, no border** - just the colored icon
- **Icon Size:** 20-24px
- **Icon Color:** `var(--color-brand)` or `var(--color-secondary)` depending on context

## Pages Updated

| Page | Changes |
|------|---------|
| **Typography** | Page header icon: neutral bg + colored border |
| **Colors** | Added page header icon; section icons (Architecture, Primitives link, Semantic Colors) now colored icons only |
| **Spacing** | Page header icon: neutral bg + colored border |
| **Semantic** | Page header icon: neutral bg + colored border; section icons (Color Roles, Radius, Layout) now colored icons only |
| **Components** | Page header icon: neutral bg + secondary color; component section icons now brand-colored icons only |
| **Greenshift** | Page header icon: neutral bg + colored border; CSS section icon now colored icon only |
| **Primitives** | Page header icon: neutral bg + secondary color; category card icons now brand-colored icons only |
| **Primitives/Colors** | Added page header icon with neutral bg + colored border |

## Styleguide Updates

Updated `styleguide.md` with:
- New section **3.3 Section Header Icons** documenting the "colored icon only" pattern
- **Icon Style Summary** table showing all icon locations and their styling
- Updated checklist to differentiate page icons from section icons

---

Done! I've updated all section header icons to use consistent vertical alignment:

## Changes Made

**Pattern:** `alignItems: 'flex-start'` + `marginTop: 4` on the icon

This ensures the icon aligns with the title text, not the center of the entire text block (title + description).

### Files Updated:
- **`/tokens/semantic/page.tsx`** - Color Roles, Radius Roles, Layout Widths sections
- **`/tokens/colors/page.tsx`** - Architecture section, Semantic Colors section  
- **`/tokens/components/page.tsx`** - Component section headers
- **`/frameworks/greenshift/page.tsx`** - Copy-Ready CSS section
- **`styleguide.md`** - Documented the alignment pattern

The `marginTop: 4` offset accounts for the line-height and font metrics to optically align the icon with the center of the title text.
